comment: Smucygz,or Smoogey, is awesome. He is really laid back, nice, and helpful. If you're not very good at drawing yet he is very patient and will help you develop/strengthen your technique.
His class was extremely easy, plenty of in-class time. He doesnt really teach so much as let us do want we wanted and I liked that. I got a B and deserved an A...still a little pissed.

Not very energetic.  I love art and was a bit bored going to class.  Wish he showed more excitment toward the subject.  But, he is a new teacher....acts more like a student than a professor.  If you want an easy going class take this.  If you want more of a challenge, don't.
Great teacher! very easy going. Grades pretty easily. I'm not the best drawer in the world by any means but I still got A's and B's on everything I turned in. Take him if you get the chance!!
He is a great teacher and if you have the opportunity to take his do so. he is calm and easy to get along with. he is very interested in what he teaches and it will help you get more motivated!

He is new to teaching, therefore he is not ridiculous at what to expect and very calm, collected, and is willing to help every step of the way. He is patient with his students and gives good advice on how to better your skills. Don't question his teaching style, you'll enjoy it. But it doesn't help that he is attractive. Take him anyway, and enjoy!
